ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: I learned how to use various 3D modeling software and tools that I don't think I would've had to chance to in any other class here at Yale. I also learned to appreciate the creativity and hard work of my own art as well as my peers

I learned how to use programs like Unity and Altspace to create games, simple animations, and virtual worlds. The course involved critical thinking about which ways a world can be built to cause different experiences for the user. The final project of the course was the best part, since we were free to work on whatever we thought would be best for us. This freedom resulted in many great final projects amongst the class.

I went from knowing nothing about 3D Modelling to making my own video games and experiences. I have used it for all of the art I make since. It is my new favorite tool. I also learned more about how to learn. Everything I would want out of a class I got out of this class.
Learned about unity, game design, vr, modeling for vr, and about interactive play and the impacts of virtual worlds.
Learned how to use Unity and Altspace to make engaging and interactive 3D worlds.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: I liked the way this course was run

A lot of time was spent in the course from the instructor talking, which sidetracked us from our goals for the day. I also liked that the course dealt with different programs over the course of the semester, but I would like to see other programs added in there, like Blender, Snapchat filters, etc.
Wish the class was longer because there is so much material to learn. Otherwise this class was amazing
I enjoyed the breakdown of class time, there was a good balance between instruction and workshop time.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Yes this class was eye-opening and exciting

I would recommend it for people who are interested in building virtual worlds, especially utilizing Unity and Altspace. I would not recommend it for people who are trying to get a deep understanding of one program.
Yes. The skills developed in this class have far-reaching applications to more than just art, so I would recommend this class to anyone.
Yes! If it is taught again I really recommend it.
Yes it was incredibly fun and I learned a lot!
Yes! It was really fun and engaging!
